import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a user by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/users/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns details of a specific user

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"ID of the user","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"User details","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"12345"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"John Doe"},"email":{"type":"string","example":"johndoe@example.com"},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2023-11-28T12:00:00Z"}},"title":"User"}}}},"404":{"description":"User not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
